segments.source_content: After verifying that the installation is complete, you can run a Chaos experiment to experience the features of Chaos Mesh.

translations.zh-hant: 確認安裝完成後，您可以執行一個 Chaos 實驗來體驗 Chaos Mesh 的功能。

segments.source_content: For the method to run the experiment, it is recommended to refer to [Run a Chaos experiment](run-a-chaos-experiment.md). After successfully creating the experiment, you can observe the running status of the experiment on the Chaos Dashboard.

translations.zh-hant: 關於執行實驗的方法，建議參考[執行 Chaos 實驗](run-a-chaos-experiment.md)。成功建立實驗後，您可以在 Chaos Dashboard 上觀察實驗的運行狀態。
